issue.title: [C++] Add TDigest::Merge(const TDigest&)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13682](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13682). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently it's inconvenient to merge a single TDigest, but this is useful in contexts like the aggregate kernels. Follow-up from ARROW-13520.

comments.body:
